bibl.title: The Happy Farmer: A Student Composition from Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: A version of this paper was delivered at the 1991 meeting of the American Philological Association in Chicago. - T. Berol. Inv. Ms. graec. qu. 36 (= Pack2 1883). Reedition, translation and commentary.
bibl.seg: CRIBIORE Raffaella, The Happy Farmer: A Student Composition from Roman Egypt.

A version of this paper was delivered at the 1991 meeting of the American Philological Association in Chicago. - T. Berol. Inv. Ms. graec. qu. 36 (= Pack2 1883). Reedition, translation and commentary.
